Instruction: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat; add cumin and caraway seeds until they start to pop and the oil bubbles, about 1 to 2 minutes. Cook and stir onion and garlic in the hot oil until the onion becomes soft and translucent, for approximately 5 to 10 minutes.
Add the cauliflower and potato to the onion mixture, ensuring they are coated with oil. Incorporate chili powder, turmeric, and salt; stir to evenly coat the vegetables.
Cover the skillet and cook the vegetables over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower and potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.
